casebody.data:
Norris, Appellant, v. Welch, Warden, Appellee.

[Cite as Norris v. Welch, 124 Ohio St.3d 203, 2010-Ohio-115.]

(No. 2009-1821 Submitted January 13, 2010 Decided January 21, 2010.) Robert Lee Norris, pro se. Per Curiam.

{¶ 1} We affirm the judgment of the court of appeals dismissing the petition of appellant, Robert Lee Norris, for a writ of habeas corpus. Res judicata barred Norris from filing a successive habeas corpus petition and from seeking successive appellate reviews of the same issues. Miller v. Ohio Dept. of Rehab. & Corr., 123 Ohio St.3d 87, 2009-Ohio-4081, 914 N.E.2d 367, ¶ 1; Shie v. Smith, 123 Ohio St.3d 89, 2009-Ohio-4079, 914 N.E.2d 369, ¶ 2.

Judgment affirmed.

Moyer, C.J., and Pfeifer, Lundberg Stratton, O’Connor, O’Donnell, Lanzinger, and Cupp, JJ., concur.
